title: After ruining mid lane, Lux mains are taking her to bot lane too
body:
Why play supports when you can shield your entire team and AOE cc nuke the enemy from 2k range with this shit? 

To compensate for their crappy last hitting skill, Lux mains are playing her support now so they just have to spam spells mindlessly during laning phase and 1shot the enemy duo at level 6.

You think morgana's snare is OP? Not when compared to Lux, sure it does more damage by itself, but Lux can hit both laners and follow up from 2k range with no risk.

http://www.leagueofgraphs.com/champions/stats/middle/bronze/by-winrate

For Platinum+ it is still at  52.5%.
For Diamond+ however, it is only 51.7% - number 12 for all midlaners; with several high-popularity picks (Zed, Ahri, TF) above her.

So, question would be: If Lux is indeed so "op", then why  goes her winrate down the higher you go in the Elo? Why are Diamand+ Players able, to handle her way better, so her winrate is almost the same as Fizz' and beneath champions like Morgana, Karma, Malzahar and even Zilean (who sits on Nr.3 with 53,5%)?

Agreed. I find Annie Support far more reliable than Lux Support when it comes to CC and damage. Lux has decent support abilities, but nothing really stands out. Single target shield is handled better by Janna and Team shield is done better and more reliably by Karma. Morgana gives a better snare (though single target) and brings a shield that negates CC.

She's just an average pick that gets to be a little more aggressive in the Support role since she has no CS worries.

This isn't really news. I took Lux to the bot lane a long time ago. Then I got Morgana and haven't really played much of Lux since. Also losing Twin Shadows was a huge blow to my Lux Support, since I don't particularly like building FQC. But since they also removed the MS buff on Nomad's, the Talisman route has been far less appealing. Maybe copy the build I've defaulted to with Lulu/Karma. It should work.

Not really sure why I don't play Lux as much as I used to. I personally feel her "All Damage" refreshing shield is more valuable than Morgana's CC immune shield. Lux + Ardent Censor is a good team shield for seizing objectives and team fights. And while Lux may have a shorter duration snare, it does pass through minions if you know your angles. Her skills aren't as quirky as Lulu's (annoys me to no end when I try to shield an ally and Pixie mark the enemy instead because I tried to click, instead of using portrait) and her poke isn't stopped by minions like Karma's.

I guess the real reason is that I hit level 5 Mastery with her a long time ago and have spent most of the past months leveling other supports. And when it comes to picking level 5 Supports... Sona and Lux take the bench.
I used to carry games with sona....now shes just eye candy.
